item.title: I need help with a tut im making
item.dc:creator: @cc987 cc987
item.description:
@cc987 wrote:

i need help with a tut im makeing i will give credz if u help

im trying to make so the the quest page will show which owners admins and mod are logged in

so i did this
i added this

sendQuest("updateRequired = true; textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("air zi")) { textUpdate = "Owner air zi Is Online!"; } else { textUpdate = "Owner air zi is Offline!"; }", 7332);

in

public void RefreshSummonBook() {

but i get these errors which i never came across b4 so if anyone knows what to do i would appreciate help

client.java:2384: unclosed string literal sendQuest("updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:2393: unclosed string literal }", 7332); ^ 2 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
